### LineEditor() {#a850c7f0652c0d7273484a266093805dd}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>LineEditor::LineEditor (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> ProgName, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> HistoryPath=&quot;&quot;, FILE &#42; In=stdin, FILE &#42; Out=stdout, FILE &#42; Err=stderr)</>}>
Create a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lineeditor">LineEditor</a> object.

<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="ProgName">The name of the current program. Used to form a default prompt.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="HistoryPath">Path to the file in which to store history data, if possible.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="In">The input stream used by the editor.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="Out">The output stream used by the editor.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="Err">The error stream used by the editor.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/lineeditor/lineeditor-h/#l00033">33</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/lineeditor/lineeditor-h">LineEditor.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/lineeditor/lineeditor-cpp/#l00194">194</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/lineeditor/lineeditor-cpp">LineEditor.cpp</a>.

## Public Member Functions

### getCompletionAction() {#a2c9715831437239c8b4aebeb3772ba7b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>LineEditor::CompletionAction LineEditor::getCompletionAction (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Buffer, size&#95;t Pos) const</>}>
<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use">Use</a> the current completer to produce a <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lineeditor/completionaction">CompletionAction</a> for the given completion request.

If the current completer is a list completer, this will return an AK&#95;Insert <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lineeditor/completionaction">CompletionAction</a> if each completion has a common prefix, or an AK&#95;ShowCompletions <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lineeditor/completionaction">CompletionAction</a> otherwise.


<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="Buffer">The string to complete</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="Pos">The zero-based cursor position in the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a></ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/lineeditor/lineeditor-h/#l00104">104</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/lineeditor/lineeditor-h">LineEditor.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/lineeditor/lineeditor-cpp/#l00082">82</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/lineeditor/lineeditor-cpp">LineEditor.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### setCompleter() {#ac206d08836b1ecbc66b9bef758bbd5d3}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;typename T&gt;</>}
  prototype="void llvm::LineEditor::setCompleter (T Comp)"
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Set the completer for this <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lineeditor">LineEditor</a>.

A completer is a function object which takes arguments of type <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> (the string to complete) and size&#95;t (the zero-based cursor position in the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a>) and returns a <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lineeditor/completionaction">CompletionAction</a>.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/lineeditor/lineeditor-h/#l00085">85</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/lineeditor/lineeditor-h">LineEditor.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### setListCompleter() {#af10d0940b86e6d4650dfe2c55c65f4bf}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;typename T&gt;</>}
  prototype="void llvm::LineEditor::setListCompleter (T Comp)"
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Set the completer for this <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lineeditor">LineEditor</a> to the given list completer.

A list completer is a function object which takes arguments of type <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> (the string to complete) and size&#95;t (the zero-based cursor position in the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a>) and returns a std::vector&lt;Completion&gt;.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/lineeditor/lineeditor-h/#l00093">93</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/lineeditor/lineeditor-h">LineEditor.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
